text: Miika Elomo (21 April 1977 â€“ 9 February 2025) was a Finnish professional ice hockey player. He was drafted by the Washington Capitals in 1995. Elomo played just two games for the Capitals before he was traded in 2000 to the Calgary Flames, although he never played for the team. Elomo died at his home in Val d'Oise, France on 9 February 2025, at the age of 47.https://www.mtvuutiset.fi/artikkeli/miika-elomon-kuolemasta-uutta- tietoa/9098386 ==References== Category:1977 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Finnish ice hockey left wingers Category:Sportspeople from Turku
title: Miika Elomo
